summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering and Parks and Recreation Departments; authorizing a transfer of jurisdiction of a parcel of vacant City (Engineering Department) property in Block 2 of The Sander-Boman Real Estate Co's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle in King County, Washington, to the Department of Parks and Recreation; making a reimbursable appropriation for payment into the Arterial City Street Fund, and declaring the emergency therefor. (R/W \#7305-1)
